dcterms:description: The Habitat-Matterport 3D Dataset (HM3D) consists of 1000 large-scale 3D environments designed for embodied AI research, providing a rich set of environments for testing and training AI models.
dcterms:title: Habitat-Matterport 3D Dataset (HM3D)

dcterms:description: The AI Habitat Simulator is a platform designed for embodied AI research, allowing for the simulation of various environments and scenarios for training AI agents.
dcterms:title: AI Habitat Simulator

dcterms:description: Depth images captured using the Intel RealSense D435i camera, used for training a binary classifier to derive a sensor-based score function for path-following.
dcterms:title: Depth Images from Intel RealSense D435i

dcterms:creator: C. Cortes
V. Vapnik
dcterms:description: Support Vector Machine (SVM) data used for training a binary classifier to derive a sensor-based score function for controlling a mobile robot.
dcterms:title: Support Vector Machine (SVM) Data

dcterms:description: OpenBot platform data used for experiments involving a mobile robot platform that utilizes smartphones for autonomous control.
